scrollTop.title: Scroll from top
scrollTop.description: Number of pixes to scroll by

scrollBehavior.title: Scroll behaviour
scrollBehavior.description: Behavior of scroll, either 'smooth' for smooth scrolling, or 'auto' for instant scrolling.

cellByCell.title: Traverse cell-by-cell
cellByCell.description: Instead of scrolling, traverse notebook cell-by-cell (which also combines stepwise scrolling and cell activation/deactivation). Small number of cells (50-100) is recommended for benchmarking such scenario. 'scrollTop' and 'scrollBehavior' have no effect if this variant is enabled. Has no effect in file editor.

editor.title: Editor type
editor.description: Editor widget to test completion in

path.title: Path to document
path.description: Optional path to an existing document of specified editor type. When empty (default) a new temporary file will be created.

cells.title: Number of cells/blocks to append
cells.description: If using a notebook, how many cell should be created? For file editor, how many lines?
